bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, uniquely shaped tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
New Specialized ProSet 7075, cone head bolt and plastic clip, 12-degree, 4-degree shim, 31.8mm
New Shimano Ultegra Di2, Flight Deck compatible
New Shimano Ultegra Di2, Flight Deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, aramid bead, 127 TPI, 700x23c
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, aramid bead, 127 TPI, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Expert, hollow ti rails
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
